body:
I can't say that I _didn't_ experience network issues. The whole thing was slow and unresponsive, but I figured that was because the remote display protocol didn't handle latency well, and because I didn't know what I was doing with all the mouse buttons in Plan 9.

In any case, I'm taking a break from working on this, since I've run out of ways I can contribute, and I don't know anything about Plan 9 to help.

Let me know if you want me to try something, but it's probably faster for you to just debug it on GCE yourself.
